subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] rs 469 post
author: Lisby
full_text:
Ron,

I do have someone close to me on the other side names Helen who I  
have been asking after. Perhaps you can ask if this Helen is for me.

Ann

On Jan 23, 2008, at 6:00 PM, Ron Lederer wrote:

>
> I am posting two short sessions for hopefully others to comment  
> on.  This is completed with a RS 469 going directly into my  
> handheld digital recorder.  Coincidentally, I am outside in a light  
> rain so maybe it is ideal for me here in Mexico where I get few  
> signals.
> At first I thought I heard the word BUENO (hello in Spanish) but I  
> now hear DINO with is my wife's name...short for Dinorah.  She is  
> normally not with me for sessions and was not with me for this  
> session so I doubt what I am hearing.  Any comments would be  
> appreciated.
> The other recording I hear the name HELEN.  I don't know anyone  
> with that name.  Ron L
>
> Looking for last minute shopping deals? Find them fast with Yahoo!  
> Search.
>
>  <evphelen.wav>


Ron,I do ha e someone close o me on he o he side names Helen who I ha e been asking a e . Pe haps you can ask i his Helen is o me.AnnOn Jan 23, 2008, a 6:00 PM, Ron Lede e w o e: I am pos ing wo sho sessions o hope ully o he s o commen on.  This is comple ed wi h a RS 469 going di ec ly in o my handheld digi al eco de .  Coinciden ally, I am ou side in a ligh ain so maybe i is ideal o me he e in Mexico whe e I ge ew signals. A i s I hough I hea d he wo d BUENO (hello in Spanish) bu I now hea DINO wi h is my wi e's name...sho o Dino ah.  She is no mally no wi h me o sessions and was no wi h me o his session so I doub wha I am hea ing.  Any commen s would be app ecia ed.  The o he eco ding I hea he name HELEN.  I don' know anyone wi h ha name.  Ron L Looking o las minu e shopping deals?
